title: Until Midnight
description: I want to thank you,” He whispered, pulling his bottom lip between his teeth.“For what?”“For rocking my world. It was only supposed to be one night.I’d chosen him to be my escape.Then one night became two… Brando King had been the perfect distraction. I wanted to be friends. He wanted all of me. The truth was, the girl he had fallen for didn't exist. I'd been hiding the real me to protect a secret... one that had almost cost me my life. If I opened up, could I trust Brando not to run? **Until Midnight is part of the Happily Ever Alpha World**
author: Gwendolyn Grace
